dataRoles.description: (Required). Set the measure display in the field. You can only add one value.
dataRoles.name: Main Measure

dataRoles.description: You can set a field that will split the card and all values (main measure, additional and hint values) into several. Keep in mind that if some values cannot be divided into categories, then the same value will be output for all cards.
dataRoles.name: category

dataRoles.description: Add additional measures for which you can configure conditional color formatting. These can be indicators of deviations. You can add no more than 3 measures.
dataRoles.name: additional

dataRoles.description: Add additional measures that will be included in the tooltip of the card.
dataRoles.name: tooltips

percentageWidth.description: The percentage width allows you to adjust the proportion of width occupied by the main measure. Takes a value from 10 to 90.

paddingSide.description: Set the value from 0 to 15 to adjust the offset of the main measurement value from the left or right edge of the card border.

verticalAlignment.description: Vertical aligment specifies the type of location of the value of the measure by the height of the card. Choose 1 of 3 types: Top, Middle, Buttom.

horizontalAlignment.description: Set 1 of 3 alignment types for the value of the main measure: left, center, right.

color.description: The default color of the main measure value. If you use conditional formatting and none of the conditions are met, then this color will be visible.

decimalPlaces.description: Specify decimal places for decimal number.

textSize.description: Specify the font size for the main measure value.

fontFamily.description: Specify the font family for the main measure value.

suppressBlankAndNaN.description: Include this field if you want to replace the value of the main measure with another text in the case of Blank or NaN.

blankAndNaNReplaceText.description: Specify the text or symbol to replace the Blank or NaN values. It can be a value of 0, — or a warning symbol.

labelAsMeasurename.displayName: Show measure name instead of category
labelAsMeasurename.description: If you need to replace the category names with the name of the main measure, then enable this field. For example, when categories need to be spelled out in separate text.

horizontalAlignment.description: Set 1 of 3 alignment types for the name of the main measure or category if it is used: left, center, right.

position.description: Set up a constraint for alignment: the name of the main measure or category will be in the area of the main measure section or across the entire width of the card.

paddingTop.description: Set the value from 0 to 15 to adjust the offset of the measure or category name from the upper edge of the card border.

paddingSide.description: Set the value from 0 to 15 to adjust the offset of the main measurement value from the left or right edge of the card border.

color.description: Choose a color for the text of the name of the main measure or categories.

textSize.description: Specify the font size for the name of the measure or category.

fontFamily.description: Specify the font family for the name of the measure or category.

wordWrap_.description: Word wrap of the name measure or category is disabled by default. Enable this field if you want to change it.

backFill.description: Background color for the visual element. If the values are divided into categories, then the settings for each card are saved.

borderShow.description: Add a border for the card.

borderFill.description: Set the border color of the card.

borderWeight.description: Set the width of the border line. The value should be from 1 to 30.

cardsPerRow.description: The maximum allowed number of cards in one row is 15. The rest are transferred to the second and subsequent levels.

cardsMargin.description: The maximum distance between individuals cards is 100.

fontFamily.description: Specify the font family for additional measure.

percentageWidth.description: Allows you to adjust the percentage of width occupied by the entire block of additional measures. The value is from 30 to 70.

paddingTop.description: Adjusts the distance between the top edge of the card and the value and category of additional measures. The value should be from 0 to 40.

paddingBottom.description: Adjusts the distance between the bottom edge of the card and the value and category of additional measures. The value should be from 0 to 40.

paddingLeft.description: Adjusts the distance between the left edge and the value and category of additional measures. The value must be between 0 and 40.

paddingRight.description: Adjusts the distance between the right edge and the value and category of additional measures. The value must be between 0 and 40.

marginOfMeasure.description: Adjusts the distance between rows or columns of value and categories of additional measures. The value should be from 0 to 40.

wordWrap_.description: Word wrap of label is disabled by default. Enable this field if you want to change it.

horizontalAlignment.description: Set 1 of 3 alignment types for additional measure: left, center, right.

layoutType.description: Select a vertical or horizontal arrangement of categories and values of additional measures.

verticalTextAnchor.description: Choose 1 of 3 types of category alignment and additional measure values: top, middle, bottom.

textAnchor.description: Regulates the location of the category text and the values of the additional measure among themselves. You can configure the text to be to the left or right of the value, as well as above or below it.

componentType.description: It is possible for an additional measure to output not only its value, but also a deviation from the main measure. Choose one of the 4 options for each measure.

invertVariance.description: Сhanges the order of calculation for an additional measure.

textSize.description: Specify the font size for additional measure.

decimalPlaces.description: Specify decimal places for decimal number.

suppressBlankAndNaN.description: Include this field if you want to replace the value of the additional measure with another text in the case of Blank or NaN.

blankAndNaNReplaceText.description: Specify the text or symbol to replace the Blank or NaN values. It can be a value of 0, — or a warning symbol.

fontFamily.description: Specify the font family for label of additional measure.

wordWrap_.description: Word wrap of label is disabled by default. Enable this field if you want to change it.

textSize.description: Specify the font size for label of additional measure.

isItalic.description: Make label of additional measure italic.

isBold.description: Make label of additional measure bold.

componentTypeForColor.description: Select the relative value itself or the deviation you need to adjust the color formatting. You can also set up a complex condition using F(x).

invertVarianceForColor.description: Сhanges the order of calculation for an additional measure.

unmatchedColor.description: The default color of the additional measure. If you use conditional formatting and none of the conditions are met, then this color will be visible.

comparisonOperator1.description: Select a logical condition from the list for comparison.

value1.description: Enter a numeric value to limit the condition.

assignColor1.description: Set the color of the value of the additional measure for this condition.

comparisonOperator2.description: Select a logical condition from the list for comparison.

value2.description: Enter a numeric value to limit the condition.

assignColor2.description: Set the color of the value of the additional measure for this condition.

comparisonOperator3.description: Set the color of the value of the additional measure for this condition.

value3.description: Enter a numeric value to limit the condition.

assignColor3.description: Set the color of the value of the additional measure for this condition.
